content.webTitle: Oliver Burkeman's Campaign Diary: Oprah's vote recorded incorrectly

fields.headline: "Make sure you double-check..."
fields.bodyText: No wonder some people are jittery. Oprah Winfrey recounts: When I voted yesterday electronically, the first vote that you vote for on the ballot is the presidential candidate. It was my first time doing electronic, so I didn't mark the X strong enough, or I held down too long. Because then when I went back to check it, it had not recorded my presidential vote. So, yeah, if you're an American voter: double-check. [via Huffington Post]
